modShortDescription: Adds harsher penalties for being hungry and thirsty. When you need food or water mobility will be impacted. Also adds a nerf to barter and selling when drinking Grandpas elixirs.
modDescription:
Adds harsher penalties for being hungry and thirsty. When you need [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) or water mobility will be impacted. Also adds a nerf to barter and selling when [drinking](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-drinks/) Grandpas elixirs.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/A20ModletsJax/tree/main/JaxTeller718-HarsherFoodPenalties)**
